des: "Always a hit at get-togethers this unique and delicious salsa is fabulous on chicken or fish.  It can also be served with bagel chips or tortilla chips."
ins: Place the grapes, avocado, red pepper, yellow pepper, onion, and cilantro in a mixing bowl. Season with lime juice, garlic salt, and black pepper. Gently fold the ingredients together until well mixed. Refrigerate 30 minutes before serving.
